name: Introduction to Python
description: Start your coding adventure by learning the basics of Python and writing your first program.

name: Variables & Data Types
description: Learn how to store, manage, and use different types of information like text and numbers.

name: Control Flow (If/Else)
description: Make decisions in your code to create smarter, more responsive programs.

name: Loops (For/While)
description: Master the art of repetition to perform tasks efficiently and work with collections of data.

name: Functions
description: Organize your code into reusable blocks to make your programs cleaner and more powerful.

name: Lists & Dictionaries
description: Learn about Python's most powerful tools for storing and organizing collections of data.

name: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Start thinking like a programmer by solving common problems with simple algorithms.

name: Final Project: Build a Game
description: Combine everything you've learned to build a fun, interactive text-based adventure game.
